synopsis.p: Applies BioLG and lp2lp to sentences.

description.p: applies BioLG and lp2lp to sentences specified as annotations from the layer. Sentence words are specified by annotations in the layer. For each sentence, only words entirely included in the sentence will be considered; and should create these layers with the appropriate annotations. Additionally BioLG can take advantage of word POS tag specified in the feature.
The BioLG executable and all necessary resources (affix and worddictionaries) must be in the directory specified by . Options to the executable are and .
The BioLG output is directly fed to lp2lp executable specified by , its configuration file is specified by .

param-doc.name: sentenceLayer
param-doc.p: Layer containing sentence annotations.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: wordLayer
param-doc.p: Layer containing word annotations.

param-doc.name: posFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature in word annotations containing the POS tag.

param-doc.name: parserPath
param-doc.p: Directory where BioLG is installed.

param-doc.name: maxLinkages
param-doc.p: Maximum number of linkages to store.

param-doc.name: timeout
param-doc.p: Time in seconds before entering in panic mode.

param-doc.name: lp2lpExecutable
param-doc.p: Path to the lp2lp executable.

param-doc.name: lp2lpConf
param-doc.p: Path to the lp2lp configuration file.

param-doc.name: dependencyRelation
param-doc.p: Name of the relation containing the dependencies.

param-doc.name: constantRelationFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each relation created by this module

param-doc.name: sentenceRole
param-doc.p: Name of the role of the sentence in the dependency relation.

param-doc.name: headRole
param-doc.p: Name of the role of the head in the dependency relation.

param-doc.name: dependentRole
param-doc.p: Name of the role of the modifier in the dependency relation.

param-doc.name: linkageNumberFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the dependecy tuple feature containing the linkage number.

param-doc.name: constantTupleFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each tuple created by this module

param-doc.name: dependencyLabelFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the dependency tuple feature containing the dependency label.

param-doc.name: documentFilter
param-doc.p: Only process document that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: sectionFilter
param-doc.p: Process only sections that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: union
param-doc.p: Either to process unions.

param-doc.name: wordNumberLimit
param-doc.p: Maximum number of words per biolg/lp2lp run.

param-doc.name: sentenceFilter
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a boolean for each sentence. only parses sentences for which the result is true.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
